adventures.description: A list of adventures within the map.

continent_rect.description: The dimensions of the map within the continent coordinate system, given as top-left (NW) and bottom-right (SE) corner coordinates.

default_floor.description: The default floor of the map.

label_coord.description: The coordinates of the map label.

map_rect.description: The dimensions of the map, given as the coordinates of the lower-left (SW) and upper-right (NE) corners.

mastery_points.description: A list of mastery insights within the map.

max_level.description: The maximum level of the map.

min_level.description: The minimum level of the map.

points_of_interest.description: A list of points of interest (landmarks, waypoints, vistas, etc).

sectors.description: A list of areas within the map.
